backend/main.mo: Defines Nakshatra types, a lookup table, validation, and functions to determine Nakshatra, Pada, and related degree calculations.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides one‑sentence summaries of all frontend files for documentation and reference.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures routes for Today, Knowledge Base, and Nakshatra Detail pages and wraps the app in theme and router providers.
frontend/src/components/alerts/AlertsTog: Toggle switch component for enabling or disabling Nakshatra change alerts.
frontend/src/components/alerts/Nakshatra: Displays a dismissible banner when the Nakshatra changes, using alert state from a hook.
Searchable dialog for selecting a city and updating stored city preferences.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Header with navigation, city picker trigger, local time display, and alerts toggle.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: App shell layout containing header, routed content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/nakshatra/Naksha: Renders a clickable card linking to a nakshatra detail page, showing its name, number, deity, symbols, and planetary ruler.
Displays detailed nakshatra information including symbols, deity, traits, themes, and pada breakdown using cards, tabs, and accordions.
frontend/src/components/nakshatra/Transi: Calculates and displays estimated times for upcoming pada and nakshatra transitions based on moon movement and selected city timezone.
frontend/src/components/today/DailyInter: Shows daily interpretation text for a given nakshatra, including emotional climate and a narrative day overview.
frontend/src/data/cities.ts: Exports a list of cities with names, timezones, and coordinates for timezone-based features.
Provides structured daily interpretation text for each nakshatra, including emotional, mental, social, and thematic insights.
frontend/src/data/nakshatras.ts: Defines the Nakshatra data model and exports detailed entries with symbols, traits, themes, and padas.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on user identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCitySelection.ts: Manages selected city using local storage and computes its current local time.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a context and provider for managing Internet Identity login state, storing identities, and exposing helper flags for login status.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalStorage.ts: React hook that syncs a state value with localStorage for persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useNakshatraAlerts.ts: Tracks Nakshatra changes and displays an alert banner when the current Nakshatra differs from the last seen value.
frontend/src/hooks/useNakshatraNow.ts: Polls and provides the current lunar longitude and Nakshatra using a query hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps react-query for fetching Nakshatra determination from an actor based on lunar longitude.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/astro/lunarLongitude.ts: Computes an approximate lunar longitude using a simplified astronomical formula.
frontend/src/lib/nakshatra/index.ts: Utilities for converting Nakshatra names to slugs and retrieving Nakshatra data by slug.
frontend/src/lib/time/timezone.ts: Formats a date into a localized time string for a given timezone.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/KnowledgeBasePage.tsx: Renders a searchable list of all Nakshatras with filtering and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/NakshatraDetailPage.t: Displays detailed information for a specific Nakshatra identified by slug.
frontend/src/pages/TodayPage.tsx: Shows today’s current Nakshatra, transition times, interpretations, and change alerts.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, architecture notes, image requirements, and a list of implemented app features for the Daily Nakshatra application.
